 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּנָת‎</span>] **noun masculine** ==associate== (Old Aramaic id, [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>298</sup> [[BDB#Cook|SAC]]<sup>65</sup>; [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>B 6</sup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Christian-Palestinian Aramaic [<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">] [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 46</sup> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 93</sup>; √ apparently <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כנח‎</span> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 56, a</sup>) <span class="bdbLangGreek">β</span> 2 [[BDB#Marti|M]]<sup>§ 74 c</sup>; [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] makes loan-word from Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***kinâtu***</u></abbr>, ***'Genosse,'*** but see [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>WB 338</sup> [[BDB#Zim|Zim]]<sup>M.p. 66</sup> \*); — ***associate***, plural suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּבָוָתֵהּ‎</span> [[Ezra.5.6|Ezra 5:6]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְהוֺן‎</span>- [[Ezra.4.9|Ezra 4:9]]; [[Ezra.4.17|Ezra 4:17]]; [[Ezra.4.23|Ezra 4:23]]; [[Ezra.5.3|Ezra 5:3]]; [[Ezra.6.6|Ezra 6:6]]; [[Ezra.6.13|Ezra 6:13]].
